ca.cmput301.team13.taskman
Class RequirementListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.RequirementListAdapter

public class RequirementListAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a list of requirements from the VirtualRepository to list views.
